reviews.review: Simply great, my only flaw would be there may have been to many jokes, and I feel the idea of there being one winning outcome seems a little ridiculous.
Incredibly well done — all the characters were juggled well. The pacing was great. Packed with great humor, action, and drama. And left me incredibly excited for the follow up :)
Epic fight scenes, a devastating ending and a big purple guy. Best movie everrrrr

Infinity War, the movie that everyone had been anticipating since the MCU debuted in 2008--and it definitely delivered. This movie was great! I don't know any other movie that can do so many crossovers so seamlessly, and at the same time, develop a villain that we can all understand, yet root for the Avengers to beat because he is so misguided. The action in this movie was excellent as expected, and the story flowed very nicely. There was lots of comedy, and we were able to see the transition from the "broken up Avengers" to the newly formed Avengers, with an additional, like 10,000 new characters. All jokes aside, this was a great way to round up the MCU in one movie, and any comic book fan should watch this movie.
A perfect way they made Thanos with his goals and the tears at the end! It was so good and I have rewatched it 5 times!
The story is about an interesting main villain although it's also the great culmination of the franchise so far. A heroic epic, with great acting, worrying and directing along with stunning visuals
this movie keeps you on your toes the whole time and is a very emotional rollercoaster. Loved it.
Una montaña rusa de emociones en donde el gran villano parece invencible y nos sorprende al lograr su objetivo
This movie was all about THANOS

Cgi and fights between strange alien guys can't hide the absence of a decent story. The characters are really badly made, and their decisions are dumber than themselves. There are some good scenes, but the others are so terrible you can't understand how people like this more than mediocre superhero movie
